## Line of sight calculator

It's very useful when planning operations involving VHF and UHF frequencies to
visualize the line of sight between two locations.
My [Winter Field Day 2024](events.qmd#wfd-2024) experience is an example of *not* doing this in advance.

Here's a link to the calculator:

<https://www.scadacore.com/tools/rf-path/rf-line-of-sight/>
